#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

string s;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while (t--)
    {
        cin>>s;
        bool b=0;
        for (int i=0; i<(s.size()/2) +1; i++)
        {
            if (s[i] != s[s.size() - i -1])
            {b=1;break;}
        }
        if (b==1)
        cout<<"NO\n";
        else
        cout<<"YES\n";
    }
}
